thread.section_title: Booking.com Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Booking.com | www.booking.com | 4 van 464
thread.title: James Nacass

author: James Nacass
title: James Nacass
text:
Because hotels fear to lose booking magic ranking, they tend to accept over bookings and put people in other hotels. It just happened to me and it's not acceptable.
I've been sent from Coco Beach hotel in Costa Rica to a hotel which does not even have one unique name: Los Almendros or Manuel Antonio Park hotel...
And I had to pay 90 dollars for this place..
